Package Server.game.map

Class Map<T extends Cell>

java.lang.Object
Server.game.map.Map<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of cell this map stores, must extend Cell
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ShipsMap, ShootingMap
public abstract class Map<T extends Cell> extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a generic square map containing cells of a specific type. Used as a base class for specific map types like shooting maps or ship maps.
See Also:

    • areCoordinatesInBounds

      public boolean areCoordinatesInBounds(CellCoordinates coordinates)
      Checks if the given coordinates are within the bounds of the map.
      Parameters:
      coordinates - the coordinates to check
      Returns:
      true if within bounds; false otherwise
